page.title: 10JOHN MUIR - NATURALIST
page.content: {John Muir}was born in 1838 in Dunbar and lived for 11 years at 130 High Street.As a young boy John Muir explored the surrounding countryside and coastal area.It was here he developed his love for the countryside In 1849 John Muir left for the USA.In America he became famous as a pioneer naturalist keen on preserving the countryside which he saw being destroyed by farming and industry.He bagan to campaign for conservation of areas such as Sequoia, Yosemite, and Sierra Valley. {John Muir}became famous world-wide because of his work for conservation of the environment. The Country Park at Dunbar was named the John Muir Country Park to commemorate him.
